org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor

Class SimpleOptimiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SkelOptor
      • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.optor.SimpleOptimiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optimisable

    public class SimpleOptimiser
extends SkelOptor
    This optimiser finds the 'best' replica of the required file but never replicates, all files are read by remote I/O. All functionality is provided by the methods in the SkelOptor superclass.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4
